scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w apps/server" "npm run dev -w apps/trainee-station" "npm run dev -w apps/trainer-console"
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/server && npm run build -w apps/trainee-station && npm run build -w apps/trainer-console
scripts.test: npm run test -w apps/trainee-station && npm run test -w apps/trainer-console && npm run test -w apps/server
scripts.prisma:deploy: npm run prisma:generate -w apps/server && npm run prisma:migrate -w apps/server && npm run prisma:seed -w apps/server
